contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 26, 1861 D Sheffield Gardens Band Contest
Sheffield Gardens Band Contest 0 Other
sheffield-gardens-band-contest
None
Botanical Gardens, Sheffield See http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc4286.htm
Prizes: 1st: £20 2nd: £10 3rd: £5 4th: £3 5th: £2
Highest placed band that had never received a prize worth £10: A cornet by J. Higham - Rotherham
After playing the first time round, several tricks were performed by some malicious persons on the instruments of the Chesterfield Band, and one fresh instrument had to be procured.
July 19, 2011, 5:57 p.m. Jan. 29, 2012, 3:32 p.m.
